content.description: Viscosity Flavor Cherry Placement sounds sweet but it’s really a sloper fest after the initial crimp box starting holds. Utilize the incut holds to start with a slab stance and go up over the ledge and then make a funky sloper grip move to mantle and topout.
content.location: In the low southern side of the second canyon you encounter hiking along the DMZ.

content.description:
Milk Shake Academy is a warmup Boulder you can hit between harder climbs at Snaggletooth and Family Fun.  

  Start on obvious crimp boxes and go directly up over slopers to a funky move that may make you wish you out the pad down or brought one!  

  Will test newer climbers but goes in steets but still letting you get a few pulls in.
